title: Currently Available Guides
content:
# Currently Available Guides Below is the list of guides currently available in guided development. ****
Guide Name Type
Add a chart building block - CAP CDS - OData V4 - Flexible Programming Model
Add a custom action to a page using extensions - OData V2 - OData V4 - TypeScript
Add a custom card to an overview page - Extension Point
Add a custom filter to the filter bar - TypeScript - Extension Point
Add a custom section to an object page using extensions - OData V2 - OData V4
Add a field group to an object page - XML - CAP CDS - ABAP CDS
Add a filter bar building block - Flexible Programming Model
Add a header facet to an object page using data points - XML - CAP CDS - ABAP CDS
Add a link list card to an overview page - XML
Add a list card to an overview page - XML
Add a new contact view column to a table - XML - CAP CDS - ABAP CDS
Add a new section to an object page - XML - CAP CDS - ABAP CDS
Add a new visual filter to the filter bar - XML - CAP CDS
Add a progress indicator column to a table - XML - CAP CDS - ABAP CDS
Add a rating indicator column to a table - XML - CAP CDS - ABAP CDS
Add a smart chart facet to an object page - XML - Manifest Change
Add a smart micro chart column to a table - XML - CAP CDS - ABAP CDS
Add a stack card to an overview page - XML
Add a static link list card to an overview page - Page Configuration Change
Add a table card to an overview page - XML - CAP CDS
Add a table building block - CAP CDS - OData V4
Add an action button - XML
Add a value help to a field in the filter bar - XML - CAP CDS
Add an analytical card to an overview page - XML - CAP CDS
Add and edit filter fields - XML - CAP CDS - ABAP CDS
Add and edit table columns - XML - CAP CDS - ABAP CDS
Add custom columns to the table using extensions - Extension Point
Add an interactive chart to a list page - XML - CAP CDS
Add a key performance indicator \(KPI\) tag to a page - XML - CAP CDS
Add multiple fields to a column in responsive tables - XML - CAP CDS
Add semantic colors to visual filters - XML OData V2 - XML OData V4 - CAP CDS
Add semantic highlights to line items in a table - XML - CAP CDS
Add status colors and icons to a column in a table - XML - CAP CDS - ABAP CDS
Configure flexible column layout - Manifest Change
Configure inbound navigation - Page Configuration Change
Configure multiple selection for a table - OData V2 - OData V4 - Manifest Change
Configure multiple views for tables - XML OData V2 - XML OData V4 - CAP CDS
Configure mass edit via dialog - Page Configuration Change
Configure object page header - XML - CAP CDS - ABAP CDS
Configure outbound navigation - XML
Configure selection of all rows in a table - Manifest Change
Configure side effects - XML - CAP CDS
Configure spreadsheet export - Page Configuration Change
Configure variant management for controls and pages - OData V2 - OData V4
Configure default grouping in a table - XML - OData V2 - Page Configuration Change
Configure auto load for a table OData V2 OData V4
Configure table type OData V2 OData V4
Define a filter facet - XML
Enable a Show Related Apps button - Page Configuration Change
Enable condensed table layout - Manifest Change
Enable data label in analytical charts - Page Configuration Change
Enable data label in smart charts and KPI cards - Page Configuration Change
Enable draft toggle buttons - Page Configuration Change
Enable inline creation of table entries - Page Configuration Change
Enable object creation in a table via dialog - Manifest Change
Enable semantic date range on smart filter bar - Page Configuration Change
Extend forms in sections - Extension Point
Extend object page headers using extensions - Extension Point
Set default filter values for the filter bar - XML - CAP CDS
Set selection limit for tables - Page Configuration Change
Specify layout for the card container - Page Configuration Change
Specify refresh interval for cards - Page Configuration Change
